about.title: About us
gameModes.basicQuiz.description: Play a basic quiz game. You will be presented with an image, a question related to the image, and a set of possible answers. Try to choose the correct answer. You can also ask the AI chat for a hint!
gameModes.basicQuiz.name: Normal Game
gameModes.endlessMarathon.description: Endless mode, no question limit. Keep answering questions until you miss while you climb up in the leaderboard!
gameModes.endlessMarathon.name: Endless marathon
gameModes.expertDomain.description: Play a basic game, but focused on an specific topic. Show your knowledge on your favourite topic, or let the randomized spinning wheel decide for you to make the game more challenging!
gameModes.expertDomain.name: Expert's domain
gameModes.timeAttack.description: In this game mode, the time is the limit. Try to answer as fast as you can and as much questions as possible before the timer goes to 0!
gameModes.timeAttack.name: Time attack
homePage.welcome: Welcome to WiChat game! Select a game mode to start playing:
index.title: What is Wichat
login.title: Welcome back!
signup.error: An error ocurred during singup, please try again.
signup.title: Welcome!
